title: What's New
markdown: #####NOVEMBER 2018 ####Data Release and Data Update The November 2018 data release includes new proteomic, single-nucleus RNAseq, ChIP-Seq, and metabolomic data as well as new network and eQTL analyses for several human studies. The AD Cross Species study has released analyses that compare gene expression between human and mouse AD models. In addition, RNAseq data for several new AD mouse models has been released. Several existing studies also have provided updates to individual samples or study descriptions. Please visit the Data Releases and Updates page for a detailed description of all new and updated data. --- #####MAY 2018 ####Data Release Additional data is available for the previously released ADMC_ADNI1 study. This release adds bile acid metabolomics to the previously released lipidomics data from the p180 platform. All data in this study has been generated on the ADNI1 cohort and requires access approval through ADNI. --- #####APRIL 2018 ####Data Update Updates were made to samples included in the ROSMAP WGS data and the MSBB study. Visit the Data Releases and Updates page for detailed information on excluded or remapped samples.
